citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC conducted an animal facility inspection and a program review on September 30, 2024 and submitted a report
to the Institutional Official (IO), however, the report did not include signatures from a majority of the IACUC members.
Reports submitted to the IO shall be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members to confirm agreement with
the inspection findings. Failure of a majority of the IACUC members to review the findings and sign the report could lead
to the omission of a minority view or a deficiency in the facility's animal use program.
Correct by having the semiannual report reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members before submission to
the IO.
Correct by: March 12, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC conducted an animal facility inspection and a program review on September 30, 2024 and submitted a report 
to the Institutional Official (IO), however, the report did not include signatures from a majority of the IACUC members.  
Reports submitted to the IO shall be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members to confirm agreement with 
the inspection findings. Failure of a majority of the IACUC members to review the findings and sign the report could lead 
to the omission of a minority view or a deficiency in the facility's animal use program. 
Correct by having the semiannual report reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members before submission to 
the IO. 
Correct by: March 12, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
